text:
Retirement Benefits Notice 2005

I make the following notice under section 5(1A) of the Retirement Benefits Act 1993 .

3 June 2005

J. G. COX

Minister for Finance

1. Short title
    This notice may be cited as the Retirement Benefits Notice 2005 .

2. Commencement
    This notice takes effect on the day on which Part 6 of the Public Sector Superannuation (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act (No. 2) 2004 commences.

3. Interpretation
    In this notice –
        Act means the Retirement Benefits Act 1993 .

4. Bodies and organisations to which Act applies
    It is declared that the Act applies to the following:
    Aurora Energy Pty Ltd  Esk Water Authority  Forestry Tasmania  Hobart Regional Water Authority  Hydro-Electric Corporation  Inland Fisheries Commission  Marine and Safety Authority  Metro Tasmania Pty Ltd  Motor Accidents Insurance Board  North West Water Authority  Nursing Board of Tasmania  Port Arthur Historic Site Management Authority  Private Forests Tasmania  Retirement Benefits Fund Board  Rivers and Water Supply Commission  Botanical Gardens Board  State Fire Commission  Tasmanian Qualifications Authority  The Public Trustee  Transend Networks Pty Ltd  TT-Line Company Pty Ltd  University of Tasmania  Workplace Standards Authority –
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    
    and to the employees and former employees of each of those bodies and organisations.

    5. Revocation of notice
        The notice to which section 29J(1) of the Act refers is revoked.

    Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

    Notified in the Gazette on 15 June 2005

    This notice is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
